events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I want to request a refund as it does not fit me properly.
The customer's request matches refund criteria because they are asking for money back due to sizing issues.
Assigning the refund request for order #8342 to the refund specialist team for further handling.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear the jacket doesn’t fit. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please confirm if the jacket has been worn or washed, and provide the order number for verification?
The jacket is unworn and still in its original condition. The order number is 8342, purchased just last week.
Thank you for the details. We can process your refund once you ship back the jacket using the prepaid label I will send you shortly.
That works perfectly for me, thank you for the swift response and clear instructions.
The prepaid shipping label has been emailed to you. Please send back the jacket to complete your refund.
We wanted to check in and see if you have received the refund after returning the jacket. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Yes, I have received the full refund today. Thank you for your help throughout the process.
Closing this case as the refund was successfully processed and confirmed by the customer.
